metadata.title: CVE-2020-35533 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within the"LibRaw::adobe_copy_pixel()" function (libraw\src\decoders\dng.cpp) whenreading data from the image file.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
